p: In this context, we started from the knowledge of the 3D structure of a number of protein antigens and applied the MLCE approach to predict the sequence, structures and location of candidate epitopes [ 28, 29, 30, 31, 32, 33, 34]. Interestingly, the predicted sequences, once realized in the form of isolated peptides and displayed for testing with sera/plasma on ELISA plates, showed diagnostic performances similar to those of their cognate full-length proteins.
